bean.p:messageText: Create your plan by finding and adding courses to any term

property.name: onClickScript
onClickScript
property.value: openMenu('@{#line.uniqueId}','planner_menu_@{#line.categoryString != null ? #line.categoryString : 'completed' }@{#line.menuSuffix}', null, e, '.uif-collectionItem', 'uif-boxLayoutHorizontalItem test4', {tail: {align:'top'}, align:'top', position:'right'}, false);
